name: Shooting Gallery (itch) (lilou_cormic)
description:
Game prototype submitted to Fragment Jam. Made in late 2018 in Unity 2018.3.0b5. Updated to Unity 2019.1.11f1 for the jam.

I had just found the Kenney assets and wanted to make a small game out of it.  I don't think I'll be continuing this game as I have others going now. But I hope you will enjoy it.

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

Contains graphics by Kenney (www.kenney.nl)

Controls
- Left-mouse click to shoot
- Shooting the bull-eye will give you double the points
